CustomField.formula: IF(Apttus_Config2__LineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.ProductCode == '7705SARH', IMAGE('/resource/ProductImage7705SARH','7705SARH.jpg', 100,300),IF(TEXT(Select_the_Shelf_Type__c) =='SAR-Ax(-48V/+24V) with 12 x Gig-E ports', IMAGE('/resource/ProductImage7705SARAx', '7705_SAR-Ax_f.jpg', 150, 200),IF(OR( (TEXT(Select_the_Shelf_Type__c) =='SAR-A(-48V) with 8 x Gig-E,4 x FE and 8 x E1/T1 ports'),TEXT(Select_the_Shelf_Type__c) =='SAR-A(-48V) with 8 x Gig-E,4 x FE ports'), IMAGE('/resource/ProductImg7705SARA', '7705_SAR-A_f.jpg', 150, 200), '-')))
CustomField.label: Product Image
